scripts.dev: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail --names backend,frontend "pnpm run backend" "pnpm run frontend"
scripts.frontend: pnpm --prefix frontend install && pnpm --prefix frontend run dev
scripts.frontend:build: pnpm --prefix frontend install && pnpm --prefix frontend run build
scripts.frontend:lint: pnpm --prefix frontend install && pnpm --prefix frontend run lint
